create.title: Create a workshop
create.description: You're about to create a workshop, you'll be able to create several tables within it and invite your colleagues to join.
create.workshop_description_placeholder: The workshop where you'll find all the TaskHub company's projects, so you can carry out every new adventure!

success.title: The workshop has been created
success.description: Your workshop has been created, and you can now go to your workshop to add new work tables.
